## BotBuilderCloudAdapter.TeamsFxAdaptiveCardActionHandler.triggerVerb property

The verb defined in adaptive card action that can trigger this handler. The verb string here is case-insensitive.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
triggerVerb: string;
```
